entries.content: Found 24 TypeScript errors in LogicManager after refactoring. Missing property declarations and imports for: EventBusSetup, DIContainerBootstrap, ChatBootstrap, ModuleFactory, ProviderInitializationCoordinator, ChatCreator, EventHandlerSetup. Need to add property declarations and check if these classes exist in orchestration folder.

Fixed 24 TypeScript errors in LogicManager.ts after ultra-modular refactoring. Added missing imports for DIContainerBootstrap, ChatBootstrap, ModuleFactory, EventHandlerSetup, ProviderInitializationCoordinator, and ChatCreator. Added 9 property declarations for bootstrap/factory instances used during initialization. Build now passes successfully.
